title: Ex-Trump adviser Waltz in for 'brutal' hearing for UN job, Dems say
shortDescription: "I think it will be a brutal confirmation hearing," Sen. Mark Warner said of Mike Waltz. "I think he's going to have tough questions."

title: Trump unsure if he must uphold Constitution
shortDescription: President Trump said, "I don't know," when asked on NBC's "Meet the Press" if he must uphold the Constitution to execute his deportation strategy.

title: Australian prime minister claims election victory, riding anti-Trump wave
shortDescription: Australia’s Anthony Albanese claimed a historic second term as prime minister powered by voters' concerns about the influence of President Donald Trump.

title: Trump says he can't run again in 2028: 5 takeaways from new interview
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said he takes responsibility for only the 'good parts' of the economy and said he's not looking to run for president in 2028.

title: White House posts AI image of Trump as the pope
shortDescription: The White House posted an AI-generated image of President Donald Trump dressed as the pope on X, sparking both backlash and glee.

title: Trump aides cheer Sovereignty's win over Journalism in Kentucky Derby
shortDescription: Junior Alvarado, the jockey who rode Sovereignty to victory over Journalism in the 151st Kentucky Derby, grew up in Venezuela.

title: Stephen A. Smith says he's glad to hear Donald Trump would 'love to see him run'
shortDescription: Stephen A. Smith characterized himself as a fiscal conservative and a social liberal, but said he would run for president as a Democrat.

title: Trump says he doesn't know if he must uphold Constitution
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said, "I don't know," when asked on NBC's "Meet the Press" whether he must uphold the Constitution to execute his deportation strategy.

title: Mexican president says she rejected Trump's offer to send US troops
shortDescription: Mexican President Claudia Sheinbaum said on Saturday that U.S. President Donald Trump had proposed sending U.S. troops to Mexico to combat drug trafficking, but said she had rejected that offer because "sovereignty is not for sale."

title: White House proposes $1 billion budget cut for national parks
shortDescription: The 2026 White House budget proposal would slash park spending by $1 billion, transfer "many" sites to states

title: Activists say Trump’s first 100 days mark setback for civil rights
shortDescription: President Donald Trump's first 100 days in office has sparked concerns he is rolling back decades of civil rights protections.

title: Trump's first 100 days: Millions in crypto profits
shortDescription: Trump returned to the White House days after launching a cryptocurrency meme coin that analysts say is now worth a fortune.

title: Australia's Albanese claims election victory, riding anti-Trump wave
shortDescription: Supporters at Labor’s election party in Sydney cheered and hugged each other as Albanese claimed victory and said his party would form a majority government.

title: Trump thinks ESPN host should run for president. Dems aren't so sure.
shortDescription: The 57-year-old "First Take" host knows how to create a buzz, but progressives activists and voters are skeptical about embracing bombastic celebrity

title: White House posts image of Trump dressed as the pope
shortDescription: The White House on Friday posted an image of President Donald Trump dressed as the pope on X, sparking both backlash and glee online.

title: Judge strikes down Trump order against law firm Perkins Coie
shortDescription: U.S. District Judge Beryl Howell's ruling was the first deciding the legal merits of any of the several directives Trump has aimed at law firms.

title: Trump proposes $44 billion boost in Homeland Security budget
shortDescription: The president's plan would increase Homeland Security spending by two-third for one year.

title: White House budget proposal slashes NASA money
shortDescription: A budget proposal from the White House could reduce NASA's budget by about $6 billion, or 25%.

title: Top Republican senators criticize Trump's proposed military budget
shortDescription: The senators say the one-time increase won't have the lasting effect of a permanent addition to the defense budget.

title: NY group files lawsuit, asks Trump to stop sinking of SS United States
shortDescription: A suit seeking to prevent Okaloosa County from turning the SS U.S. into an artificial reef says preserving the ship honors "American greatness."
